about_the_game:
In the future world, science and technology will continue to flourish. Human beings will enter the space and begin to explore the universe. Monsters will be found on unknown planets. Humans began to study these monsters. Suddenly one day, monsters began to attack humans crazily for some reason, so humans had to fight with monsters to protect themselves.

Player 1 (wsad) is up, down, left and right (jkluioneq) is the attack jump block skill
Player 2 (keyboard direction key) is up, down, left and right (0123456789), which is the attack block skill

About "Prehistoric Warcraft" is a gorgeous action fighting game!
About this game, there are eight characters that can be used! Each character has different characteristics, and two people can play at the same time. You can also play single player games.
Unique and excellent fighting: defeat the opponent in any situation, experience the passion of fighting, give full play to potential, and send out different skills through various key combinations.
Artificial intelligence: The opponent has strong strength and wisdom, and he will try his best to knock you down.
Secret: There are many secrets and surprises waiting for you to explore!
Hope: I hope you like this game, and I hope you can get happiness from this game!
detailed_description:
In the future world, science and technology will continue to flourish. Human beings will enter the space and begin to explore the universe. Monsters will be found on unknown planets. Humans began to study these monsters. Suddenly one day, monsters began to attack humans crazily for some reason, so humans had to fight with monsters to protect themselves.

Player 1 (wsad) is up, down, left and right (jkluioneq) is the attack jump block skill
Player 2 (keyboard direction key) is up, down, left and right (0123456789), which is the attack block skill

About "Prehistoric Warcraft" is a gorgeous action fighting game!

name: Prehistoric Warcraft

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: 1GHz 32-bit or 64-bit processors
  • Graphics: 128 MB video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Inter(R)Core(TM)i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz 3.00GHz
  • Graphics: 256 MB video memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This is a duel independent game! There are eight characters in it, you can play with your friends! It has a unique way of playing. I hope you can experience infinite fun from it! It's definitely worth it!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean, Uzbek, Urdu, Armenian, Igbo, Sindhi, Sinhala, Croatian, Icelandic, Cherokee, Galician, Catalan, Afrikaans, Kannada, Luxembourgish, Hindi, Indonesian, Gujarati, Kyrgyz, Kazakh, Turkmen, K'iche', Kinyarwanda, Tajik, Serbian, Odia, Welsh, Konkani, Bangla, Nepali, Basque, Hebrew, Latvian, Tigrinya, Slovak, Slovenian, Swahili, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Georgian, Maori, Wolof, Bosnian, Persian, Telugu, Tamil, Irish, Estonian, Valencian, Belarusian, Quechua, Zulu, Xhosa, Lithuanian, Sotho, Sorani, Yoruba, Uyghur, Scots, Tswana, Filipino, Mongolian, Hausa, Dari, Azerbaijani, Amharic, Albanian, Assamese, Tatar, Macedonian, Marathi, Malayalam, Malay, Maltese, Khmer
